div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h1: CLOSURE EXTENDED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE 2019-2020 ACADEMIC YEAR

div.p: In order for families to access remote learning plans in one easy-to-locate site, the following links have been created for each building. Click each building link below and search by grade level...
Help us celebrate our AMAZING BHCUSD8 SCHOOL LUNCH HEROES this Friday, May 1st by dressing up like a superhero and writing thank-you messages for National School Lunch Hero Day. You can share a...

li.a: Increase in EBT Benefits for BH Families

div.p: Week 6 of Covid-19 School Closure Meal Signup at this link: https://bit.ly/3cMPmqc view image

Illinois has launched Call4Calm, a free emotional support text line for Illinois residents experiencing stress and mental health issues related to COVID-19. To speak with a mental health professional, text “TALK” or “HABLAR” (for Spanish) to 552020 #ILSchoolsStepUp view image
Sign up for Week 5 meals during the Covid-19 school closure: https://bit.ly/2RPDls0 view image

Reminder that #BHill8 is distributing Remote Learning materials today at Wolf Ridge from 3:00 PM until 6:00 PM at the car line. Please stay in your car and let us know your child's grade and teacher. view image
Please see this flyer for details regarding Remote Learning Packet pickup tomorrow (Tuesday, 4/14) at Wolf Ridge from 3-6 PM view image
Sign up for meals this week 4/13-4/7 at this link: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=DQSIkWdsW0yxEjajBLZtrQAAAAAAAAAAAAN__pcdUXZUOThJMTJJOERSWDhGODJaV1E4RUhQOTRSQS4u view image

Our Homework Hotspot at the Unit Office is now even stronger. If accessing, please do so from a vehicle on the north side parking lot. Please practice social distancing. Kudos to #BHill8 Maintenance Director Doug Dey for the professional installation #ILSchoolsStepUp view image
How about a non-COVID19 update? With all the somber posts, here is something to look forward to: a mockup of the BHHS floors to be finished this summer! view image
